net.derquinse.common.io

Class MemoryByteSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.io.ByteSource
      • net.derquinse.common.io.MemoryByteSource

  • @Beta
public abstract class MemoryByteSource
extends ByteSource
    Base class for byte sources that are guaranteed to be stored in memory, either in byte arrays in the heap or direct buffers. The byte source may be contiguous or backed a list of chunks. Total size must fit in an integer. The default chunk size is 8 KB.
    Author:
    Andres Rodriguez

        public abstract MemoryByteSource merge()
        Merges to a byte source consisting of a single chunk.
        Returns:
        The merged byte source. Maybe the same one if already consisted of only one chunck.

      • merge

        public abstract MemoryByteSource merge(int chunkSize)
        Merges to a byte source consisting with a chunk size of at least the provided argument. If the argument is smaller than the size, the byte source will be merged to a single chunk.
        Parameters:
        chunkSize - Requested chunk size.
        Returns:
        The merged byte source. Maybe the same one if already consisted of only one chunck.

      • toHeap

        public abstract MemoryByteSource toHeap(boolean merge)
        Transforms this source into a byte source stored in the heap.
        Parameters:
        merge - Whether the result should be merged.
        Returns:
        The resulting byte source.
